message.body: have you seen the havoc micro bikini question yet?
Yeah that was hilarious, I didn't have time to write a response though
I'm fwd it to neil right now just cuz its funny. I'm writing guy back right now..m its funny cuz he's like "I would like to include this model"
The video looked too pro to me but as long as it's not nudity or overtly sexual I think it's ok
man, I have a lot of work this week, I have to do all the QC lists cuz Ann is away. I haven't been able to do any actual scouting in weeks
oh one thing I wanted to mention, I don't think xuansong does anything with the "synopsis too long" feed back thing in the QC lists. I would just save th(1/2)
at for when they are really really long like #166(2/2)
Ok will do. And thanks for the help with the formatting issues. I
I'm answering steoh sessacs question right now... she must be the infamous #19 who has been posting all those YouTube professional vloggers and such. lol(1/2)
, if you Google her name you can find her blog and YouTube channel. it seems like she's trying to be a professional vloggrr herself(2/2)
That's not what we need in the corpus
I know. we don't need fucking idiot vlogs. I'm trying to find a nice way to say that to her... its just funny how she apparently is aspiring to be a pro vlogger
Just tell her vlogs are not useful because the project is about identifying actions
I wonder if working on HAVIC made her want to become a pro vloger?
